rationale: PFE has been consolidating within a tight range and recently broke above a key resistance level on high volume. Positive news on their pipeline and strong sector momentum support a bullish breakout trade.

DUK has shown strong relative strength in the utilities sector and is currently pulling back to a key support level. With a bullish trend intact and defensive sector rotation, a pullback buy offers a high reward setup.

PG is approaching its earnings release date and historically tends to rally into earnings. Positive analyst sentiments and sector rotation towards consumer staples support a bullish call option trade for an earnings run-up.
